summary: A proof of concept of the Secret Clothes from Final Fantasy Tactics.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES LATEST SKYRIM UPDATE!


Just a simple proof of concept for the secret clothes from Final Fantasy Tactics. To get go to the console and type     help "Secret Clothes"    just as you see it here. The just type     player.additem xxxxxxxx 1     replacing the x's with the id of the item. [s]No I am not telling you what it does unless you want to spoil it for yourself[/s]. (It turns you invisible whenever you equip it. Yeah old me was kinda lame and stupid) If you have played FFT you know what this does already [s]however if you really want to know before you download there is a link in the description as to what it does in FFT. It behaves exactly the same in this game as it does there so are ya happy now?[/s]

Also on Steam Workshop [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=370655348]here[/url]!

[color=#444444]If you really want to know what this does that check this out [url=http://finalfantasy.wikia.com/wiki/List_of_Final_Fantasy_Tactics_Armor#Ninja_Gear]here[/url] :([/color]
author: cdogs55
